item.title: LPIC 305
item.description: As part of my job as a Consultant I need to get some specific certifications from time to time. And recently I got invited to take the beta exam 305 which is a split from the old 304 - Enterprise Virtualization and High Availability, creating the 305 - Enterprise Virtualization and Containerization and 306 - Enterprise High Availability and Cluster Storage.
